docs.name: Covidien plc (NYSE:COV) - Free Cash Flow per Share (As Reported - Annual)
docs.description:
Indicator Description [Free Cash Flow per Share]: Free Cash Flow per Share is a valuation metric calculated by dividing [FCF] by [SHARESWA].

Company Self Description [Covidien plc]: We are a global leader in the development, manufacture and sale of healthcare products for use in clinical and home settings. Our products are found in almost every hospital in the United States, and we have a significant and growing presense in non-U.S. markets. Our mission is to create and deliver innovative healthcare solutions, developed in ethical collaboration with medical professionals, which enhance the quality of life for patients and improve the outcomes for our customers and shareholders.

Dimension: (As Reported - Annual) - ARY

Statement: Metrics

Units: currency/share

Sector: Healthcare

Ticker: COV

Exchange: NYSE

Index Membership: S&P500

docs.name: Rock-Tenn CO (NYSE:RKT) - Profit Margin (Most Recent - Trailing Twelve Months)
docs.description:
Indicator Description [Profit Margin]: Measures the ratio between a companies [NETINCCMN] and [REVENUE].

Company Self Description [Rock-Tenn CO]: We are one of North America's leading integrated manufacturers of corrugated and consumer packaging. We report our results of operations in three segments: Corrugated Packaging; Consumer Packaging; and, Recycling.

Dimension: (Most Recent - Trailing Twelve Months) - MRT

Statement: Metrics

Units: %

Sector: Consumer Goods

Ticker: RKT

Exchange: NYSE

Index Membership: S&P400, RUSSELL1000
